name: One Last Job
description:
🎮 The Game

 Enjoy a thrilling tale set in the desert. 

 Follow Will on a branching journey through his personal hell.

 Decide over his fate.

❤️ Made with love for story and soul.

💬 Recommended to be played in full screen.

💬 The game features music that needs some loading time before kicking in. 

⌨️ Controls

Point-and-click to continue the story.

👤 Credits

Story & Design - Thomas Boone 

Shout out to PixelCrushers: Dialogue System for Unity
and Febucci: Text Animator for Unity

❤️ Thanks for playing!

 💬 Comment below to share your thoughts & suggestions.
